chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 Pro is experiencing the following issue:
Battery problem, purchased 1 month ago, battery state is new today at 89%.
Thank you for your help,

Hello Nana, You will find your return prepaid label attached. Chronopost will handle your return. Choose the location that suits you best to send back your package. You will find a list of drop-off locations here: https://www.pickup.fr/trouver-un-point/ Return preparation: 1. See instructions for returning an item at here 2. Add all accessories provided with your item 3. Remove any protective cover, case, and screen protector 4. Package your item and its accessories according to the instructions below. Packaging the item: • The box must be sturdy and rigid. Place your item so it is stable and does not move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box. You can also place an additional label inside in case the outer label gets damaged. • Take photos of the inside and outside of the package before sending it. This will protect you in case of a problem during transport. Your return is ready to send! We'll let you know when it arrives. Best regards, The Back Market Customer Service, The Back Market Customer Service

Hi ecomobile,

This is an exceptional case and BackMaket will handle the case and refund the customer on our side.

Please contact your SSC for more information.  

Thanks for your help
Alphonse Back Market customer Care.
